description: The last_used_passwords parameter in SAP HANA specifies the number of last used passwords that the user is not allowed to reuse when changing his or her current password

queries.name: q_password_policy_last_used_passwords
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'last_used_passwords'

actions.description: It has been determined that last_used_passwords parameter is lesser than the default recomended value 5. Recomended/Stronger password policy is crutial in improving the security of SAP HANA.

references: SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
